website_summaries.verdict: The best budget salon chair to choose when you want a greater level of features and capabilities.
pros: Uses an extremely durable leather fabric on the seat and back support to resist normal wear and tear
Armrests and foot rest do a good job of accommodating a wide variety of body styles
Heavy-duty hydraulic pump makes height adjustment easy
20-foot wide base makes it easy to anchor to the floor without bolts
cons: Does not recline for facial treatments

customer_reviews.title: The chairs came as expected and were in good condition. They shipped in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: The chairs came as expected and were in good condition. They shipped in a timely manner. We haven't had them a year and they have had normal use but they are all messed up. The base on everyone of them is bent and one of the chairs, the arms broke off. I'm not real happy with them. I have reached out to the seller to see what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy G

customer_reviews.title: Just needs a booster for kids nothing more or nothing less for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved chair a few days before delivery date which is always great! Assembly was a little difficult but no missing pieces, manual was really easy to follow. Two people assembly makes it just a bit easier, not impossible alone though. Hydraulic works perfect so far, none of the items shipped were scuffed or damaged like some other reviews claimed. Was feeling skeptical about it but figured I’d give it a try and just order one myself, for the price you’re getting everything you need. Back rest screws could be the only thing that would be better located. Doesn’t wobble, super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LenzoBlendsTX

customer_reviews.title: Defective part. Aggresive "Customer Service"
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived with hydraulic pump reversed. Simple manufacture issue. That alone is maybe 3 star review but the fact that their customer service rep directly contacted me my mother and had a belligerent attitude towards us is deplorable. I just wanted to return the item and they instead attacked me verbally for trying to return a brand new item I was not satisfied with.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: So I was looking for a "wide seat" chair that will be comfortable for my beautiful plus size clients
customer_reviews.text: Item came before the ship date!!! I am a stylist and one of my last chairs broke. So I was looking for a "wide seat" chair that will be comfortable for my beautiful plus size clients. THIS WAS MY CHAIR!!!!!! I had a little problem with putting it together at first because i didn't know the screws were already put in the chair to ensure that none of the screws were missing. So i contacted the seller and she was amazing!!! very nice and patient with me. she offered to send me another chair if the screws were missing. however i found them! lol overall a great experience and great chair!
customer_reviews.author: Terraia

customer_reviews.title: one damaged chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 chairs one was in perfect condition. N the other one had scratches on the pump cover n a cut on the bottom part of the chair..other than that I like them but they where supposed to brand new..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These chairs r big nice and comfortable but I've had 3 for about a ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs r big nice and comfortable but I've had 3 for about a year and they consistently make clicking noises like someone's kicking the underside of the chair!! What's up w/ that!? Very annoying to the stylist and the client in the chair?? Any advice??
customer_reviews.author: sslike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I put together myself and the instructions were great.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept , but the chair has ALOT OF FLAWS ! The screws where not in the right place , I have the bottom half of the back part screwed in but not the top because it’s so far down and uneven the pump to lift the chair you literally have to pull it up with your hands , you can pump it with your feet , , I had to work with what I had because I don’t have time to order a new one but I definitely will not be ordering a new one , I have a salon with lots of chairs never had this problem before with any other company
customer_reviews.author: sommer

customer_reviews.title: Read this before assembling!  It DOES down LOW for shorter people and is wide and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The arm holes did not line up. After three hours of jacking around with it we got it rigged enough so that I can use it. I don’t have time to send it back or I would! It is comfortable and wide. It goes down very low so when foiling/coloring the top of your clients head your shoulders are not killing you. It’s good for someone short which was my main goal. The back of the chair is not too high so it is not in the way of cutting longer hair. ⚠️Make sure the arm rest holes line up with the back rest holes of the chair before you assemble anything else!!!! ⚠️
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Problems right away
customer_reviews.text: This started dropping unexpectedly right away. Company said to put more hydraulic oil in it. Shouldn't it come with the correct amount??? Wife had to get a replacement as this was unreliable. Guess poor quality is what happens when you try to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo the Magnificient

customer_reviews.title: Defective chair
customer_reviews.text: Took hours to put together andvthe hydrolic didn’t work!! No one has gotten back to me!! I have never had this problem with Amazon, I would like to hear from someone on what to do😡
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Zucker

customer_reviews.title: It tips over easily when people lean forward
customer_reviews.text: Cheap light weight base. It tips over easily when people lean forward. The chair part is nice. Its better to keep your old base, if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too narrow for anyone to sit in. embarrassed clients
customer_reviews.text: this chair was so narrow, some fit uncomfortably, some didn't at all. the shipping is $60 each way. so cost me more to return then the chair was worth. SUUUUUPER not happy
customer_reviews.author: Talea archibald

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s a styling seat gets job done. What I don’t like is poor unclear instructions and illustrations. The holes that were put in place to put screams weren’t even in easy positions. One of the holes go through the zippers which made it impossible to even screw it in. The hydraulic Foot lever is not easy to use and have to to apply so much weight just to get it to lower or higher it. Manufacturers could’ve most definitely did a better job
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!! This chair at This price....yes please!
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a salon chair in my staple for a while. Then this beauty came along at the right time for the right price!!! Took me and my two sons two attempts to put together but after about 30-45 mins😅 it was good to go. Pre-posted screws were a bonus to show exactly where to put things. I love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: TamTam BamBam

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking chairs
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chairs, but a month later they don't stay up! Constantly having to lock them while a client is in the chair just to prevent it from lowering.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: pealing the leg surface
customer_reviews.text: I keep it inside the house and in regular temperature no wet area and no humidity place, and using afew times , just I notified the leg surface start to pealing and corrosion. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chairs were easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were easy to assemble. Hydraulic does not seem to go as high as other chairs, also slowly slides down while using. I Should have checked the height before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: christina walls

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The salon chair was just what I needed. Fits right in the small space and my clients haven’t complained about it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Shack

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these chairs for almost a year and they look very sleek and professional in my salon. I love the quality and they have not failed me yet. Im actually purchasing another now. This will be chair #5!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt go up high and hard to turn with heavy clients
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a chair that will be used full time I would not purchase this one. It doesnt go up very high and is very hard to turn when your client is heavier which makes it very awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad investment
customer_reviews.text: The foot rest sticks pretty far out causing a possible trip hazard, and if you sit on the edge of the seat it will tip over. Otherwise it is a decent chair for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RASCKLmommy

customer_reviews.title: Sub par
customer_reviews.text: The chair will worked just fine most likely not quite the quality I was hoping for .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Stylist chair
customer_reviews.text: Second chair for my salon. I needed an affordable option for my salon. These work well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Good for temporary use only. Do not push weight limit of chair.
customer_reviews.author: Keyla Sexton Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: What I received don't match picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and they look nothing like the picture. They are really cheaply made & flimsy. Disappointed, because I had bought in the past and was hoping they'd match!!
customer_reviews.author: melinda geffert

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 salon chairs one was defective and I would like to return 1 defective chair for a refund I am happy with the chairs there was a small mishap with that 1 other than that I am a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Yolande w

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The chairs have a nice appearance. Hydrolics are not good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and I love the chairs. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loved it to do her friends hair
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The chair is ok
customer_reviews.text: Really clean and looks good but the seat sits at a forward tilt, and I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The pump base is backwards nothing I can do since this part was assembled in box. Disappointed after being delivered 4 days late
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! When I put it together I was a little worried because it was light weight but after I used it for a couple days, I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The hydraulics cover is broken , back of chair had a hole
customer_reviews.author: Dana M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: So far the chair has met our expectations. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUR NEW CHAIR!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So i juat got this in the mail today me & my sister just finished putting it together, it was WORK BUT WE GOT IT DONE the chair doesn't recline & we had a little trouble getting the instructions right smh we were both backwards once we got it all together everything on the right way the chair is BEAUTIFUL!!! I can't wait to put my clients in it.....it locks too as long as everything is in the right way
customer_reviews.author: nyderah corbett

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: holes were not big enough, had to redrill them. Took way to long to put together.
customer_reviews.author: estrella Evans

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the chair but no hardware to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Hamel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's getting 4 stars based on price....you get what you pay for. More less comfortable, unless you have a heavy clients they may need a small pillow behind them. They tend to feel as if they are falling backwards. It has a definite back slant. The only other slight draw back is the hydraulic bar has NO AND I MEAN NO space between bar and bottom of chair cushion. So I never keep it in the lowest position.
customer_reviews.author: D'lyn of Newberg Or.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for home
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Pretty easy assembly. Slightly wobbly but that’s to be expected for under $100. It’s only for my home salon so it’s fine for that but I wouldn’t put it in my pro salon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this chair is not good at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Foot rest did not fit properly and chair don't lock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at All! It had dents and scratches, horrible instructions, leans forward, I'm using my old one probably will send this back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for salon
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, not to hard to assemble. It is a little hard to turn it around but the hydraulic pump works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chair!!!! Very stylish and does a great job for home shop.
customer_reviews.author: 1Maine

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this chair, everyone says it's comfortable and I love how easy it was to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kennitha Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for stylish, but affordable too.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. My local beauty supply wanted 250. For the same chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: ... bought 4 for our new salon and people really enjoy how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 for our new salon and people really enjoy how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Still Standing Strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy for me to put together myself. Got it at the Beginning of 2017 and its still holding to strong. Very Nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super awesome! I love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.author: SaavyWordDr

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Very comfortable for my clients of all sizes. Highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's awesome very easy to assemble. I cut hair in my home for family and friends from weight of 50 lbs to 250lbs and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Will be ordering another soon as I this is of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Inhaj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 one for my niece who is a licensed professional and one for my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Clients love it. Feels of high quality. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

product_meta.title: 20" Wide Hydraulic Barber Chair Styling Salon Beauty Equipment - DS-5001W-NEWBlack
feature_bullets: Heavy Duty Steel Frame! Premium chrome round base
Double-reinforced saddle sticking to prevent ripping and tearing!
Heavy duty hydraulic pump make height adjustment easier and locks in place
Small cell high density foam for extra comfort of your client
